title: Precognition Stance
passive: At the start of your turn, you may roll your Magical Strike damage. If you use Magical Strike during that turn, you must use the damage you rolled.
exit: Spend all your Energized and make a Magical Strike. You gain a circumstance bonus to hit equal to half the energized spent (minimum 0). If you hit, you may roll the damage twice, taking whichever result you prefer.
